attributes.additional_details:
Send this petition link to every insecure teenage girl who starves because she isn't slim enough, or hurts herself because she isn't pretty enough.

Send this petition link to any woman whose looks have been judged by the men who can only view females as sexual objects, due to the portrayal of women in the media.

Send this petition link to the families whose loved ones who have committed suicide because their relative didn't think their life was worth living as they didn't look 'beautiful' like the celebrities.

These are the real life difficulties young teenage girls and women are forced to face everyday because of the way the media portrays females.

The Daily Mail online posts hundreds of articles displaying celebrities wearing inappropriate clothing and stating how 'stunning' they look. These women are not role models.

Please sign this petition now and send to others so we can strengthen the self esteem of females, and even save the lives of insecure women!
